messages.title: FIGHTING FOR OUR LOCAL SERVICES IN COLNE VALLEY
messages.content: Jason lives in Honley and for many years he’s been campaigning on local issues. He has worked with everyone to make where we live a better place. He’s proud to have been selected at an Open Primary by local people.

messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR JASON McCARTNEY
messages.content: A Proud Yorkshireman, Standing up for our area, Real life experience.

messages.title: 5 MORE YEARS OF GORDON BROWN OR CHANGE WITH THE CONSERVATIVES
messages.content: In just a few weeks we will have the most important election for a generation. Our economy is broken and only the Conservatives can fix it. We need change to bring responsibility, transparency and fairness back into Government.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour have left the country with record unemployment. Only the Conservatives will get more people back into work.
David Cameron has promised that the NHS will be safe in Conservative hands.
We will create a new generation of good school places.
Plans to allow the majority of families to keep more of their own money to spend as they choose.

issues.economy: Our economy is broken and only the Conservatives can fix it.
issues.education: We will create a new generation of good school places.
issues.governance: We need change to bring responsibility, transparency and fairness back into Government.
issues.health: The NHS will be safe in Conservative hands.

politicalExperience.achievements: Jason served in the RAF for 10 years including in Iraq, Kosovo and two tours with Calder at IV Squadron. Has real life experience from military service.

contactInformation.address: Spring Villa, 55 Church Lane, Brighouse, West Yorkshire, HD6 1AT

images.caption: Jason McCartney with community members and engaging in various local initiatives.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Jason is a big Huddersfield Town fan.
